Sentence.sentence: You know I've often wondered why people laugh at the picture of a big belly businessman slipping on a banana skin and falling on his bottom.
Actually, Laura, I think we laugh because we are glad it didn't happen to us
Perhaps we are even a bit frightened we may get like that, so we laugh.
That never makes me laugh much, because you can guess what's going to happen
Why does the man say we laughed when we see some self-important people making fool of themselves?

sameAnalysis.word_list: laugh, smile, giggle, grin, beam, sneer
means: laugh ： 最常用词，指因喜悦、愉快或轻视而出声的笑或大笑。
smile ： 指面露微笑，侧重于无声。
giggle ： 指发出咯咯的笑声，较多地用于女人或孩子。
beam ： 书面用词，指人因心情舒畅而发出的笑，即喜形于色地笑。

example.en: Wayne laughed at the carpet, and people moved away-not knowing what he was going to do next.
example.zh: 韦恩呕吐了,而大家都走了——不知道他接下来会怎么样。

word_mean: 笑：笑的动作或发作：沉溺于笑

Sentence.sentence: At which place can people of different ages enjoy a good laugh?
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读A 题设

Sentence.sentence: Gee Whizz really knows how to make you laugh! Our bar is open from 7.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: He would laugh the loudest over fun and be the saddest over anyone's misfortune.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷2 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Surprisingly, they didn't laugh at us.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语天津卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: The workshop looks at every kind of comedy, and practices many different ways of making people laugh.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: They joke and laugh and are living in their own relaxed world.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Translated into high school terms, this means that if everybody you hang around with is laughing at what John wore or what jane said, then you can bet that wearing or saying something similar will get you the same kind of negative attention.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: It allows us to have perspective on our lives - the ability to not take ourselves too seriously, to laugh at ourselves, to see the bigger picture, and to see that things will work out.
But because hard laughter is difficult to sustain, a good laugh is unlikely to have measurable benefits the way, say, walking or jogging does.
Sentence.come: 2011年考研真题（英语一）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: Studies dating back to the 1930's indicate that laughter relaxes muscles, decreasing muscle tone for up to 45 minutes after the laugh dies down.
Sentence.come: 2011年考研真题（英语一）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

sentences.en: We were all laughing when he came in.
sentences.cn: 他进来时, 我们正在笑。

sentences.en: “And I've forgotten the sugar.”she laughed.
sentences.cn: “我把糖给忘了”, 她笑着说道。

means.word_mean: （特别表示因成功而）处于有利地位
以笑表示, 以笑感动[影响]

sentences.en: She laughed her good mood when she saw her mother.
sentences.cn: 她看到母亲时, 以笑表示了她愉快的心情。

sentences.en: He gave a good loud laugh when he saw it.
sentences.cn: 他一见到它便大笑。

sentences.en: She turned away her face with a merry, ringing laugh.
sentences.cn: 她转过脸去, 发出愉快清脆的笑声。

means.word_mean: 笑料；令人开心的时刻；引人发笑的事

sentences.en: He's a real laugh.
sentences.cn: 他真是个活宝。

means.word_mean: 引人发笑的人；逗笑好玩的人</seg>

data.mean: 令人开心的时刻；引人发笑的事；笑料
not know whether to laugh or cry 不知所措，哭笑不得
laugh at sb/sth 嘲笑；讥笑

sentence.cn: 这种情况放在高中就意味着，如果你周围的每个人都在嘲笑约翰穿的衣服或简说的话，那么你可以打赌，类似的穿着或说类似的话会让你得到同样的负面关注。
sentence.en: Translated into high school terms,  this means that if everybody you hang around with is laughing at what John wore or what Jane said,  then you can bet that wearing or saying something similar will get you the same kind of negative attention.
sentence.from: 2016年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

sentence.cn: 他会为有趣的事而笑得最大声, 而对任何人的不幸都会最伤心。
sentence.en: He would laugh the loudest over fun and be the saddest over anyone's misfortune.
sentence.from: 2017年高考英语全国卷2 完形填空 原文

mean.mean: not know whether to laugh or cry 不知所措，哭笑不得

lj.lj_ly: a daredevil who laughed at danger.

jx.jx_en_mean: To dismiss as ridiculously or laughably trivial
jx.jx_cn_mean: 一笑置之：把……当作滑稽可笑的琐事而置之不理

lj.lj_ly: laughed off any suggestion that her career was over.
lj.lj_ls: 对有关她事业生涯已经结束的暗示置之不理

phrase.cizu_name: be laughing all the way to the bank

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)be making a great deal of money very easily
be finally vindicated, thus confounding earlier skepticism
jx.jx_cn_mean: 笑到最后，最后得到证明

phrase.cizu_name: he who laughs last laughs longest

jx.jx_en_mean: (proverb)don't rejoice too soon, in case your delight at your own good fortune is premature
show open contempt for someone by laughing rudely at them in their presence(figurative)(喻)

lj.lj_ly: vandals and muggers who laugh in the face of the law.
lj.lj_ls: 嘲笑法律的涂鸦者和抢劫犯。

phrase.cizu_name: the laugh is on me (或you, him等)

jx.jx_en_mean: the tables are turned and now the other person is the one who appears ridiculous
jx.jx_cn_mean: 我（你、他等）成了嘲笑对象

lj.lj_ly: all the critics had laughed at him — well, the laugh was on them now.
lj.lj_ls: 所有的批评家都曾嘲笑他——啊，现在他们可成了嘲笑对象了。

lj.lj_ly: it's a laugh a minute when Lois gets together with her dad.
lj.lj_ls: 洛伊斯和爸爸在一起真逗人乐。

phrase.cizu_name: laugh on the other side of one's face ( 或北美

jx.jx_en_mean: be discomfited after feeling satisfaction or confidence about something
dismiss with contempt as being obviously ridiculous
jx.jx_cn_mean: 因可笑而鄙视，一笑置之

jx.jx_en_mean: laugh uncontrollably or for a long time

entry.def: When you laugh, you make a sound with your throat while smiling and show that you are happy or amused. People also sometimes laugh when they feel nervous or are being unfriendly.

example.ex: He was about to offer an explanation, but she was beginning to laugh...
example.tran: 他正要解释，她却笑起来了。

example.ex: He laughed with pleasure when people said he looked like his dad...
example.tran: 人们说他长得像父亲时，他乐得大笑起来。

entry.def: If people laugh at someone or something, they mock them or make jokes about them.

example.ex: I thought they were laughing at me because I was ugly...
example.tran: 我觉得他们嘲笑我是因为我长得丑。

example.ex: She wanted to laugh at the melodramatic way he was acting.
example.tran: 他戏剧化的夸张架势使她忍不住想笑。

entry.def: If you do something for a laugh or for laughs, you do it as a joke or for fun.

example.ex: They were persuaded onstage for a laugh by their mates...
example.tran: 他们被同伴们说服，上台一乐。

example.ex: It's a project she's  doing for laughs.
example.tran: 这个项目是她图好玩儿才做的。

entry.def: If a person or their comment gets a laugh or raises a laugh, they make the people listening to them laugh.

example.ex: If you can get a laugh by wearing a silly hat, you must have been born a comic...
example.tran: 如果你戴一顶傻傻的帽子就能让人发笑，那你一定是天生的笑匠。

example.ex: The joke got a big laugh, which encouraged me to continue.
example.tran: 我的笑话引来哄堂大笑，这使我深受鼓舞，继续往下讲。

entry.def: If you describe a situation as a laugh ,a good laugh, or a bit of a laugh, you think that it is fun and do not take it too seriously.
entry.tran: 好玩/ 开心/有点意思

example.ex: Working there's great. It's quite a good laugh actually...
example.tran: 在那儿工作挺不错。说实在的，蛮好玩儿的。

example.ex: It was a good laugh there!

entry.def: If you describe someone as a laugh or a good laugh, you like them because they are amusing and fun to be with.

example.ex: Mickey was a good laugh and great to have in the dressing room.
example.tran: 米基是个活宝，在更衣室里总是逗人笑个不停。

entry.def: If you have a good laugh about something, you find it amusing and realize that it is funny, especially when the situation was at first upsetting.
entry.tran: （尤指经历了最初的苦恼不快后）觉得…可笑，对…一笑置之

example.ex: We've both had a good laugh about the accident despite what's happened.
example.tran: 虽然出了意外，但我俩事后都一笑置之。

entry.def: If you say that you have the last laugh, you mean that you become successful at something so that people who criticize or oppose you look foolish.
entry.tran: 笑到最后；取得最后胜利

example.ex: Des  O'Connor is expecting to have the last laugh on his critics by soaring to the top of the Christmas hit parade.
example.tran: 德斯·奥康纳预计会飙升至圣诞畅销唱片排行榜的榜首，这将让他的批评者都笑不出来。

entry.def: Some people reply to other people's comments or opinions by saying 'Don't make me laugh' when they disagree with them and think they are foolish or inaccurate.
entry.tran: 别让我笑掉大牙了；别逗了

example.ex: Claire, a poisoner? Don't make me laugh — She was just a lousy cook.
example.tran: 克莱尔投毒？别逗了。她只不过厨艺很差罢了。

entry.def: If you say 'you've got to laugh' or 'you have to laugh', you are trying to see the amusing side of a difficult or disappointing situation rather than being sad or angry about it.
entry.tran: （对于困境或令人失望的境况）何妨一笑，还有可笑之处

example.ex: The bikers have shown enough contempt of the law to ride their machines over police cars. 'You've got to laugh at their audacity,' said Mr Starkey.
example.tran: 摩托车党藐视法律，竟对警车玩起凌空飞车来。“牛气可嘉呀，”斯塔基先生说道。

means.word_mean: 2. a facial expression characteristic of a person laughing;

sentences.sentence: "his face wrinkled in a silent laugh of derision"

means.word_mean: 3. a humorous anecdote or remark intended to provoke laughter;

sentences.sentence: "even a schoolboy's jape is supposed to have some ascertainable point"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English hlæhhan, hliehhan, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch and German lachen, also to laughter

sentences.en: to laugh loudly/aloud/out loud

sentences.cn: 你们听了我的笑话从不发笑！
sentences.en: You never laugh at my jokes!

sentences.cn: 表演十分滑稽，弄得我笑个不停。
sentences.en: The show was hilarious─I couldn't stop laughing.

sentences.cn: 她老是引得我发笑。
sentences.en: She always makes me laugh .

sentences.cn: 他突然大笑起来。
sentences.en: He burst out laughing (= suddenly started laughing) .

sentences.cn: 她笑了，想以此来掩饰自己紧张的心情。
sentences.en: She laughed to cover her nervousness.

sentences.cn: 我告诉他我很担忧，可他却轻蔑地一笑。
sentences.en: I told him I was worried but he laughed scornfully.

sentences.cn: “你疯啦！”她哈哈大笑起来。
sentences.en: ‘You're crazy! ’ she laughed.

sentences.cn: 要是赢了下一场比赛，我们就占优势了。
sentences.en: If we win the next game we'll be laughing.

sentences.cn: “你父亲会借给你钱吗？”“别开玩笑了！”
sentences.en: ‘Will your dad lend you the money? ’ ‘Don't make me laugh! ’

sentences.cn: 啊，真糟糕，你的鞋子丢了，可是这也挺逗的，是不是？
sentences.en: Well, I'm sorry you've lost your shoes, but you've got to laugh, haven't you?

sentences.cn: 大家都拿我的口音取笑。
sentences.en: Everybody laughs at my accent.

sentences.cn: 她不怕取笑自己。
sentences.en: She is not afraid to laugh at herself (= not be too serious about herself) .

sentences.cn: 有人猜测他要辞职，他一笑置之。
sentences.en: He laughed off suggestions that he was going to resign.

sentences.en: You never laugh at my jokes!

sentences.en: She always makes me laugh .

sentences.cn: 如果你戴一顶傻傻的帽子就能让人发笑，那你一定是天生的笑匠。
sentences.en: If you can get a laugh by wearing a silly hat, you must have been born a comic...

sentences.cn: 他模仿那位部长令我们大家发笑.
sentences.en: He gave an impression of the minister which made us all laugh.

sentences.cn: 想到他们竟怀疑我的真爱,真令我发笑!
sentences.en: I gaily laughed to think they could doubt my love.

sentences.cn: 她逗你发笑,你也很喜欢他.
sentences.en: She makes you laugh and you love her very much.

sentences.cn: 杰夫: 一定是因为食物的原因,因为你总是能让我发笑.
sentences.en: Jeff: It must be the food because you always manage to make me laugh.

sentences.cn: 我们的喜剧不是惹人发笑的.
sentences.en: Dur comedies are not to be laughed at.

sentences.cn: 小说主人翁瑞普. 凡. 温克尔, 外表逗人发笑,内心并不快活.
sentences.en: Novels ownership. Fan. Temperature Kerr, the appearance laugh heart is not happy.

sentences.cn: 这件事现在看来不可笑, 但多年以后我们想起它就会发笑的.
sentences.en: In years to come we'll laugh about this , though it doesn't seem funny now.

sentences.cn: 马克思经常讲笑话.并且使我们发笑.
sentences.en: Marx often makes jokes and makes us laughing.

sentences.cn: 他驾车在古老的路上疾驰, 暗自发笑.
sentences.en: He drove off down the ancient highway, laughing quietly.

sentences.cn: 它使他们发笑.
sentences.en: It made them laugh.

sentences.cn: 在讲那个故事的时候,他穿插了几个笑话引听众们发笑.
sentences.en: While telling the story he worked in a few jokes to make his listeners laugh.

sentences.cn: 老师看看学生的模拟, 不觉暗暗发笑, 一笑, 打了个喷嚏.
sentences.en: The teacher a student imitate, do not become aware secretly laugh, laugh, hit a sneeze.

sentences.cn: 这本滑稽的书每一页上都有令人发笑的地方.
sentences.en: The funny book had a laugh on every page.

sentences.cn: 诗2:4那坐在天上的必 发笑.主必嗤笑他们.
sentences.en: He that sitteth in the heavens shall laugh : the Lord shall have them in derision.

sentences.cn: 另有一中类型的人,其工作也是使人发笑,他们便是演员.
sentences.en: Another type of people whose job is to make people laugh are comedians.

sentences.cn: 查尔斯·卓别林由于使人发笑而使自成了名.
sentences.en: Charile Chaplin made a name for himself because of making you laugh.

sentences.cn: 当西方人摔倒时, 如果你发笑, 他们会讨厌你的.
sentences.en: When someone in the West if they fall down, if you laugh, they'll hate you.

sentences.cn: 我胳肢孩子的脚,使她发笑.
sentences.en: I tickled the baby's feet and made her laugh.

sentences.cn: 这部电影并不好, 但能引人发笑.
sentences.en: It's not a good film, but it's good for a laugh.

sentences.cn: 那坐在天上的必发笑. 主必嗤笑他们.
sentences.en: The One enthroned in heaven laughs ; the Lord scoffs at them.

sentences.cn: 她会为双关语发笑 吗 ?
sentences.en: Does she laugh at puns?

sentences.cn: 这个演员模拟王室成员的形象,逗引人人发笑.
sentences.en: The actor made everyone laugh by taking off the members of the royal family.

sentences.cn: 滑稽演员使人发笑, 同时也使人思索生活.
sentences.en: Comedians make people laugh, but also think about life.

sentences.cn: 对她讲的笑话或幽默发笑.
sentences.en: Laugh at her jokes and humor.

sentences.cn: 观众对著这喜剧演员的名堂发笑.
sentences.en: The audience laughed at the comedian's routine.

sentences.cn: 为了逗我们发笑,布赖恩总是矫揉造作,装得古里古怪.
sentences.en: Brian was always camping it up and pretending to be queer to make us laugh.

sentences.cn: 听到这样的故事,我禁不住发笑.
sentences.en: I cannot but laugh to hear such a story.

sentences.cn: 我觉得他们嘲笑我是因为我长得丑。
sentences.en: I thought they were laughing at me because I was ugly...

sentences.cn: 起初，本杰明的想法受到了人们的嘲笑。
sentences.en: Benjamin's idea was first laughed at.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 至于唐璜, 嘲笑他的人越多, 他的形象就越是分明.
sentences.en: As for Don Juan, the more people laugh at him, the more his figure stands out.

sentences.cn: 人们总是嘲笑新的思想. 革新者总是被愚弄.
sentences.en: People will always laugh at new ideas. Innovators are always ridiculed.

sentences.cn: 这些调皮的孩子们肯定不喜欢有人嘲笑他们.
sentences.en: Those monkeys certainly dislike being laughed at.

sentences.cn: 那个无礼的男孩嘲笑自己的父亲.
sentences.en: The disrespectful boy laughed at his father.

sentences.cn: 我宁愿被嘲笑,也不愿和他吵架.
sentences.en: I would rather be laughed at than quarrel with him.

sentences.cn: 他的交响曲在第一次预演时就受到嘲笑而不能上演.
sentences.en: His symphony was laughed off the stage at its first rehearsal.

sentences.cn: 要清楚, 胜利的人总是被傻瓜嘲笑的.
sentences.en: You knowinging , outstanding human are not sll the time laughed at by fools.

sentences.cn: 我本来会(实际没有)对嘲笑这种观点的行为大光其火的.
sentences.en: I would have had a hearty fit of laughing at this point.

sentences.cn: 老鼠嘲笑猫的时候,身旁必有一个洞.
sentences.en: Mouse laugh cat, when be a hole in the side.

sentences.cn: 嘲笑处于困境中的人是不礼貌的.
sentences.en: It is impolite to laugh at the people who are.

sentences.cn: 我禁不住嘲笑金尼的窘相.
sentences.en: I couldn't keep from laughing at Kinney's distress.

sentences.cn: 你一贯嘲笑那些无所适事的人.
sentences.en: U used to laugh about everybody that was hanging out.

sentences.cn: 克拉姆嘲笑法官，那对他是不利的。
sentences.en: Cram laughed at the Judge. That counted against him.

sentences.cn: 他们嘲笑比尔.
sentences.en: They laugh at Bill.

sentences.cn: 他曾嘲笑过那些临刑前还在念念有词地做着祷告的人.
sentences.en: He had laughed at those who died with prayers on their lips.

sentences.cn: 兔子嘲笑乌龟.
sentences.en: The rabbit laughs at the turtle.

sentences.cn: 他们嘲笑这个想让所有人高兴的农夫和他的儿子.
sentences.en: They laughed about the farmer and his son who tried to please everybody.

sentences.cn: 4作为同学, 你应该帮助他,而不应该嘲笑他.
sentences.en: Being a classmate, you should help him in stead of laughing at him.

sentences.cn: 你嘲笑别人还用速率为14.4的调制解调器.
sentences.en: You laugh at people with l 4.4 modems.

sentences.cn: 姐姐们看见她身上那么脏,纷纷嘲笑起来.
sentences.en: Stepsisters laughed when they saw how dirty she was.

sentences.cn: 他真是个猪头, 当我有麻烦时总是嘲笑我.
sentences.en: Man he's such a prick , he always laughs at me when I run into problems.

sentences.cn: 你在嘲笑我 吗 ?
sentences.en: Are you laughing at me?

sentences.cn: 当你犯错误时, 从错误中总结经验并嘲笑自己.
sentences.en: And when you make a mistake, learn the lesson in that mistake and laugh at yourself.

sentences.cn: 哎呀, 别想这事了, 没人会嘲笑你的.
sentences.en: Oh, forget it! Nobody will laugh at you.

sentences.cn: 然而,今天人对一神论的厌恶不再只是嘲笑那样简单了.
sentences.en: But today, that repugnance to monotheism is not a laughing matter.

sentences.cn: 如果你到处说那种话, 所有的人都会嘲笑你的.
sentences.en: If you go round saying things like that, everyone will laugh at you.

sentences.cn: 她看到母亲时,以笑表示了她愉快的心情.
sentences.en: She laughed her good mood when she saw her mother.

sentences.cn: 她以笑表示满意.
sentences.en: She laughed her satisfaction.

sentences.cn: 他以笑表示否认.
sentences.en: He laughed his denial.

sentences.cn: 他以笑表示同意.
sentences.en: He laughed his approval.

sentences.cn: 短促的 / 紧张的 / 开心的笑声
sentences.en: a short/nervous/hearty laugh

sentences.cn: 他讲的第一个笑话博得了当晚最开怀的笑声。
sentences.en: His first joke got the biggest laugh of the night.

sentences.cn: 从20世纪30年代开始的种种研究表明，笑可以使肌肉放松，在笑声逐渐消失后，肌肉张力会降低长达45分钟之久。
sentences.en: Studies dating back to the 1930’s indicatethat laughter relaxes muscles, decreasing muscle tone for up to 45 minutes after the laugh dies down.

sentences.cn: 她回想瑞德轻前常常能用笑声把她从恐惧中解脱出来.
sentences.en: She remembered how Rhett had always been able to laugh her out of her fears.

sentences.cn: 爸爸发出了轻松愉快的笑声, “ 这并不抵触! 我就属于世俗社会的, 帕茜. ”
sentences.en: Papa gave a quick , light laugh. " That doesn't prevent it! I'm of the world, Pansy. "

sentences.cn: 我听到他那沙哑而又刺耳的笑声就能认出是他.
sentences.en: I recognized him by his raucous, penetrating laugh.

sentences.cn: 他会用笑声使她摆脱忧郁的情绪.
sentences.en: He would laugh her out of her gloominess.

sentences.cn: 同学们都用惊地眼光看着他, 随后一长串的笑声.
sentences.en: Classmates look at him with Jing ground eye, grow the laugh that string together subsequently.

sentences.cn: 生活有的时候是很糟糕的, 人们需要更多的笑声.
sentences.en: Life's pretty rubbish at times, and people should be able laugh more.

sentences.cn: 他们以轻蔑的笑声使她在这个问题上沉默下来.
sentences.en: About this they laughed her down.

sentences.cn: 除了她的笑声以外,埃莉诺容得下她的种种言行.
sentences.en: Elinor could have forgiven everything but her laugh.

sentences.cn: 他发出低沉空洞的笑声.
sentences.en: He gave a hollow laugh.

sentences.cn: 船长愉快的笑声消除了我们的恐惧.
sentences.en: The captain's cheerful laugh dispelled our fears.

sentences.cn: 我记得马苏德的歌声, 他的动听的歌喉及像水声似的富有感染力的笑声.
sentences.en: I remembered Masood's singing, his beautiful voice and powerful laugh that resembled the gurghling of water.

sentences.cn: 我们只好以笑声来消除她的疑心.
sentences.en: We could but laugh off her suspicions.

sentences.cn: 酣畅的笑声》我们没有更多语言的沟通,但有酣畅的笑声!
sentences.en: Happy laughing: We don't have too much communication of language but happy laughing.

sentences.cn: 玛丽以笑声作为对老师问题的回答.
sentences.en: Mary laughed in answer to the teacher's question.

sentences.cn: 他刺耳的笑声好象三月里的风吹过树梢的声音.
sentences.en: His rough laugh was like a March wind among the tree tops.

sentences.cn: 铃声止于雨落的节奏中, 地狱中传出了常驻我头脑中的恶魔的笑声.
sentences.en: The bell died patter of rain, from hell came the laughing of Satan at my brain.

sentences.cn: 休息时,教练们像变了个人似的,说话和气,开个玩笑, 讲个笑话, 逗得学员们笑声不断.
sentences.en: They like kidding now and then, telling funny stories about the trainees, and making people laugh.

sentences.cn: 她的笑声多么具有感染力 啊 !
sentences.en: What an infectious laugh she has!

sentences.cn: 他做了个手势,猛然地制止了笑声.
sentences.en: He cut off the laughing brusquely with a gesture.

sentences.cn: 姑娘们笑声清脆.
sentences.en: The girls laughed liquidly.

sentences.cn: 丹尼斯的笑声很响.
sentences.en: Dennis has a very loud laugh.

sentences.cn: 孩子们对班主任拙劣的笑话,报以有礼貌而无趣的笑声.
sentences.en: The children gave a polite but hollow laugh to the head teacher's feeble jokes.

sentences.cn: 类似于巴诺布猿的某种灵长类可能是最先发出笑声的动物.
sentences.en: Most likely a primate similar to the Bonobo was the first to laugh.

sentences.cn: 在我们背后传来一阵轻松爽朗的笑声.
sentences.en: Behind us a light silvery laugh rang out.

sentences.cn: 她喜欢使幼孩在笑声中学到礼仪.
sentences.en: She likes to laugh a little child into manners.

sentences.cn: 乔治用笑声打消他们的忧虑.
sentences.en: George just laughed away all their apprenhensions.

sentences.cn: 他笑着答道, 不过笑声中带有一丝后悔的味道.
sentences.en: He replied, laughing but with a undertone of regret.

sentences.cn: 乔治?克鲁尼也加了个笑料,拿奥斯卡典礼的老问题开涮.
sentences.en: While George Clooney got in on the laughs by pokinga common Oscar ceremony complaint.

sentences.cn: 这是这部冷酷剧作中的笑料.
sentences.en: These are laugh lines of the grim sort.

sentences.cn: 这是一部真实的电影, 有严肃的成分在里面,但我也希望不乏合理的笑料.
sentences.en: This is real, a serious side to it but hopefully a reasonable amount of laughs.

sentences.cn: 他在心里不断地为它添油加醋, 增加笑料.
sentences.en: He kept embellishing it in his mind, building up the laughs.

sentences.cn: 现在,他将使自己成为比萨城的笑料了.
sentences.en: Now he was going to turn himself into the laughing stock of Pisa.

sentences.cn: 痴呆症已不再是笑料.
sentences.en: Dementia is no laughing matter.

sentences.cn: 一个人的信仰是另一个人的笑料.
sentences.en: One man's theology is another man's belly laugh.

sentences.cn: 他最新的小说里更多的是痛苦的退缩逃避,而不是笑料.
sentences.en: His latest novel contains more pained winces than laughs.

sentences.cn: 规则应用的不稳定性使得F1的比赛干事成了一堆笑料.
sentences.en: The inconsistent application of the rules makes F 1's race stewards a laughing stock.

sentences.cn: 一切爱国主义的东西都成了笑料.
sentences.en: Everything patriotic is a laughing stock.

Sentence.sentence: Benjamin ’ s idea was first laughed at.
